import axios from'axios';var url={GET_Customers:'/dr/customer/customers',ADD_Customer:'/dr/customer/insert',ADD_Member:'/dr/member/insert',LOGIN:'/dr/member/login',LOGOUT:'/dr/member/logout',USER_EMAIL_CHK:'/dr/member/overlap/check/',GET_Categories:'/dr/category/list',GET_MainPage:'http://localhost:4000/',GET_BoardData:'/dr/board/view/'};var config={headers:{// 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8'
'Content-Type':'application/json'}};export var API={GET_Customers:function GET_Customers(){return axios.get(url.GET_Customers,config);},ADD_Customer:function ADD_Customer(data){return axios.post(url.ADD_Customer);},ADD_Member:function ADD_Member(data){return axios.post(url.ADD_Member,data,config);},LOGIN:function LOGIN(data){return axios.post(url.LOGIN,data,config);},LOGOUT:function LOGOUT(){return axios.get(url.LOGOUT,config);},USER_EMAIL_CHK:function USER_EMAIL_CHK(data){return axios.get(url.USER_EMAIL_CHK+data);},GET_Categories:function GET_Categories(){return axios.get(url.GET_Categories);},GET_MainPage:function GET_MainPage(){return axios.get(url.GET_MainPage,'',config);},GET_BoardData:function GET_BoardData(data){return axios.get(url.GET_BoardData+data,config);}};
